: Ensure that only authorized users have access to this view, as it exposes sensitive information about invoices and user actions.
: Consider implementing row-level security if different users should have access to different subsets of data based on their roles or permissions.
: Regularly audit access to this view to ensure compliance with data protection regulations.
: If user information is frequently updated, consider caching or optimizing the retrieval of user names to reduce the impact on performance.
: As the volume of data grows, monitor the performance of this view and consider partitioning the underlying tables or optimizing indexes to maintain efficiency.
: Maintain clear documentation of the view's purpose, structure, and dependencies to aid future maintenance and troubleshooting efforts.
